targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "g1OldGen.max" WHERE "application" = 'timeseries-aggregator' AND "subsystem" = 'trends' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "value" FROM "g1SurvivorSpace.used" WHERE "application" = 'timeseries-aggregator' AND "subsystem" = 'trends' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
